sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

HSDs:
1. 1405320842: "TFM: SBR EIG 1713 Tool-lock and CTECH: " Sideband Fabric is now compatible with the 1713 HDK tool lock version.
2. 1209549625: "FWD (PCR) SBR Debug Enhancements: Debug TAP Registers (BETA-sanity validation only): " Added Debug TAP register to help debug of system-level sideband transactions in Pre and Post Silicon.
3. 1208256901: "FWD (PCR) SAI Tunneling: Add SrcID check to SBR ingress port (BETA-does not support hierarchical fabrics): " Added capability to check valid SrcID for all the Sideband router ingress ports. This is parameterized so that IOSF-SB segments not supporting SAI Tunneling do not need to implement SBR SrcID checking (for backward compatibility).
4. 1405618594: "SGDFT Reported at SBR for p1274: " Fixed the SGDFT issue in SBR for p1274.
5. 1405566084: "FWD (PCR) Enhance IOSF-SB Router To Have Parameterizable Number Of Parity Error Pins On Each Router (server): " The router can now support programmable number of parity error input pins “or”d to generate the required parity behavior.
6. 1207049429: "cgovrd/cgctrl pins not working as described in Integration guide? Writing assertion to confirm or deny: " Added assertions to check the programming of the CG pins.

Backend Updates:

General Updates:

Validation Updates:

General Updates:

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

This SBR release uses the "IOSF_SVC_2017WW13" version of SVC in IRR with constraints on hierarchical headers insertion.

For support file an HSD at https://hsdes.intel.com/appstore/article/#/sip.bugeco/create?=&subject=bugeco&tenant=sip

The first endpoint release with support for parity pins is IOSF_Sideband_Endpoint_ALL_2014WW31_R1p0_v5.

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at https://zircon.fm.intel.com/zircon/zircon/zirconReleaseDashboardTable.php?top_filter_checkbox=0&Proj_id=all&IP_id=17319&milestone_filter=4&Ver_id=all&App_id=all&showlatest=0
